APP.AUTOFIX: Attempt to automatically resolve the invalid property.
APP.COPIED_ERROR: The error message has been copied to the clipboard.
APP.TITLE: Inspect, Reflect, Correct
APP.MANUALFIX: Open dialogue to manually input replacement values.

DELETION.TITLE: Delete invalid Document
DELETION.CONTENT: This will permanently delete the invalid Document. Are you sure you wish to do this?

AUTOFIX.TITLE: Remove invalid data
AUTOFIX.CONTENT:
This will attempt to autoamtically remove the data causing the validation failure of the Document.

This will lead to permanent loss of the current value of the problematic field and can not be reverted.

Do you wish to proceed regardless?

MANUALFIX.TITLE: Manually replace invalid data
MANUALFIX.CONTENT: Please enter the new value for the relevant fields below.

NOTIF.DELETE: The Document has been deleted. Do note that this will not be visible until you refresh.
NOTIF.AUTOFIX: Automatic correction of the invalid Document has been attempted.To see the result you will need to refresh. Should it still be invalid after a refresh, the issue can not be automatically resolved.
NOTIF.MANUALFIX: The Document has been updated with the entered properties. Refresh to see the change.
NOTIF.ARRAY: Manual adjustment of Array values is not supported at this time.
NOTIF.CUSTOMTYPE: Documents with an unrecognized type originally introduced by a module can not be resolved in any way, shape or form. Your only options are to delete the Document or reinstall the Module that added the custom type.
NOTIF.UNSALVAGEABLE: Document issue could not be identified. Deletion or recovery via custom script is recommended.
